forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 44. Northeast wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Thanksgiving Day
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 53 in the afternoon. North northeast wind around 9 mph.

weather_report:
As night envelops Downtown San Francisco, the streets are alive with a gentle sparkle against the dark canvas, promising a crisp and clear evening. The current temperatures hover around a cool 44, a reminder of the season as a northeast breeze whispers softly through the streets. The city seems to breathe deeply, its beauty accentuated by a starkly cloudless sky, an invitation to pause and appreciate the stillness that descends with the night. 

Looking ahead to Thanksgiving Day, the promise of a sun-drenched afternoon awaits, with highs flirting with the mid-50s. While the coolness lingers, the sunlight will unveil the city's charm in all its glory, creating a cozy contrast against the fleeting chill. For those venturing out, layering becomes essential—an inviting knit for warmth paired with a light jacket to ward off the evening breeze. With the forecast so vibrant, consider wandering through the local parks or exploring the hidden nooks of the waterfront. Whether enjoying a quiet stroll or settling into a favorite café with friends, the day ahead holds the promise of serene moments amid the bustling charm of San Francisco.
